info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 11:50PM CDT until August 09 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Western Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Eastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... North central Wilbarger County in northern Texas... East central Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1149 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Willow to near Duke to near Eldorado, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altus, Frederick, Hobart, Mangum, Granite, Snyder, Tipton, Blair, Olustee, Eldorado, Lone Wolf, Mountain Park, Roosevelt, Manitou, Martha, Willow, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, and Altus Air Force Base. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
